Articles.Content:
Hey guys, this is my first time posting so I would like to start with my Jool system explorer prober.

I wanted to visit Jool again to finally explorer and successfully rendezvous (enter the gravity well) and fly past every moon in the Jool system. The mission was a success . I achieved a flyby of every moon (some even multiple times) with the help of orbital assists. The links to the photos are here - http://imgur.com/a/2zmBt#0. Unfortunately, I didn't grab the rest of the photos because steam "misplaced" them. If I do find them, I will post them in the comments.
